titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for the suppressing of seditious and treasonable books and pamphlets.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Bill, Thomas Newcomb, and Henry Hills, printers to the Kings most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: At end of text: Given at our court at Whitehall the one and thirtieth day of October 1679. In the one and thirtieth year of our reign.
Steele notation: Arms 87 Print- person 2) ensu- so.
Filmed copy at UMI Tract Supplement reel C18 consists of one contiguous sheet.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
